titles.title: To provide that positions held by civilian technicians of the National Guard be made part of the competitive service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal provisions relating to the National Guard to include positions held by civilian technicians of the National Guard within the competitive service. Provides that service performed by such technicians prior to the effective date of this Act shall be considered competitive service for purposes of eligibility for certain Federal benefits.
